title: New Team to Help Gaza Find Peace
summary: The White House has announced a new group called the 'Board of Peace' to help Gaza become stable. This group will be led by US President Trump and includes important people like former UK Prime Minister Tony Blair, US Secretary of State Marco Rubio, and US Special Envoy Steve Witkoff. They will work together to oversee Gaza's temporary governance and reconstruction after the war. Each member will have a specific job to do, but it is not yet known who will do what. Right now, no women or Palestinians are in this top group, but more members might be added later. The goal is to end the suffering in Gaza and bring peace.

background_read: Gaza is a place that has faced a lot of war and problems recently. The US and other countries want to help it become peaceful and stable again. A board is a group of people who work together to make decisions. In this case, the Board of Peace includes leaders from different countries who will try to fix things in Gaza. It's important because many people there are suffering, and this group aims to bring hope and rebuild the area.

perspectives.description: Some people think this board is a good idea because it brings experienced leaders together to help Gaza find peace and rebuild.
Others are worried because no women or Palestinians are in the top group, and Tony Blair's past decisions might cause problems.
